name: Late (ducklingsmith)
description:
An entry for #bitsyjam May 2021 on the theme of "Overdue Library Book". Use the arrow keys to navigate and advance text.

Flash warning: there is a single lightning strike effect. I have made it last a pretty significant amount of time and it doesn't strobe.

Built in Bitsy by Adam Le Doux with hacks from the Bitsy Hack Repo.
